issue.title: [C++] Improve CSV parser performance on Arm
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15005](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15005). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Replacing bloom filter with five simd `compare`, `or` operations improves performance significantly for long fields, without hurt performance for short fields.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15005?focusedCommentId=17456309) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11896
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11896>
